name: zkSync Labs
description: Introducing zkSync Labs, a decentralized exchange (DEX) designed for the zkSync blockchain. The platform is community-driven and focused on delivering an exceptional liquidity solution. Team developed a highly efficient and customizable protocol that empowers users and builders alike to take full advantage of our infrastructure. Team's priority is flexibility and sustainability, which is why they've taken composability to the next level. Moved beyond conventional DEX designs to deliver a unique and customized experience for the users. zkSync Labs employs a dual token system, comprising the native liquid ZKLAB and its escrowed counterpart ZKLABX, a non-transferable governance token, both utilized as farming rewards.
